text: Eduardo Guerrero (4 March 1928 – 17 August 2015) was an Argentine rower and Olympic champion. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Salto, Buenos Aires Province. Guerrero participated in the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki where he won gold medal in double sculls competition together with Tranquilo Capozzo. Guerrero died on August 17, 2015 from pneumonia at the age of 87.Murió Eduardo Guerrero, oro en remo en Helsinki 1952 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine rowers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Argentina Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:People from Buenos Aires Province
title: Eduardo Guerrero (rower)
